website_summaries.verdict: While not a true high-end mountain bike, the Protocol does have many of the positive features of a rugged trail bike with the smooth ride of a commuter bike. We suggest replacing the original saddle for casual riding, but the retail price point is hard to beat.
pros: 24 total gears and dual suspension provide smooth ride
Easy to assemble, with a detailed owner's manual
Large mountain bike tires, but works well as a commuter bike, too
cons: Construction not as rugged as a traditional mountain bike
Can require a lot of adjustments and repairs over time

customer_reviews.title: Serious quality issue
customer_reviews.text: How this is manufactured and passed quality check is beyond my imagination (yes there are two QC labels on the frame) The two wheel holders are totally unparalleled, since they are welded I have no way to adjust the angle. I was too busy so didn't talk the bike out of the box until today, and It just passed the return window, I don't know what to do with it. Contacted customer service with the picture, they said the part is on back order, hopefully I can get a replacement before winter Will see how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: X. WEI

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mountain bike!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bike! Very easy to install right out of the box and rides great. Looks awesome too!! Yes the seat is a bit uncomfortable but what bike isn't. A kickstand is also already installed on the bike. Didn't see one in the pics on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREW

customer_reviews.title: ... bike so far and the full suspension is a nice feel on those bumpy roads and bad sidewalks
customer_reviews.text: Just got this bike so far and the full suspension is a nice feel on those bumpy roads and bad sidewalks. the nice plus size tires have saved me a couple times with its extra grip when I hit muddy spots with run over. Great bike so far for the first couple weeks- will update as time goes by.
customer_reviews.author: Molo

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn from China ???
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! Schwinn the brand that use to be good is no longer. Out of the box looked beautiful but then looked again and found the forks construction is SH*T. They were constructed like some 10 year old could have. The wheel mounts were both angled 'not true' and straight plus the upper part of the fork were not evenly constructed. Absolute SH*T and let me tell you my sons new bike is going back. He is so happy...
customer_reviews.author: fish-n-fool

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea what a great mountain bike is suppose to like as I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea what a great mountain bike is suppose to like as I am a beginner in the game but I like this bike a lot. I have owned it for about a year and I took it on an intermediate trail twice and it is holding up quite nicely so far. It arrived where you had to assemble the handle bars and the front wheel(which is a quick release). I recommend getting the derailleurs adjusted by a bike shop before you go riding. The seat isn't that comfortable but I have never had a bike with a comfortable seat. I am 5'11 and 175lbs and it seems to fit me just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this bike if you are overweight
customer_reviews.text: So, I am 5'10 and 238 Lbs. This bike is not good for someone such as me. The reason being is because of the suspensions. When you ride the bike the suspensions make the bike "bouncy" and you can feel yourself going down. This is definitely not useful if you are going up the hill and overall, it slows you down. If you are light weight then this bike is good for you. I don't have any issues with the bike but it is just not meant for people who are overweight. If one is less than 200 pounds, I can see this bike not affect one as much. Honestly get a bike with that is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Abid

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn protocol 1.0
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to assemble because it came with so many missing parts. Returned it next day after talking to amazon customer service then I had to wait another month for refund. Not what I expect from Amazon. HORRIBLE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lyju Oommen

customer_reviews.title: cheap parts
customer_reviews.text: First I took this to the bike shop to do some fine tuning after putting it together. They told me there how hard the brakes were to get dialed in because the parts were so cheap and they said they would never sell these parts. Then the first day out, the pedal sheered off and bent the entire crankshaft. The quality on this bike is terrible and sending it back
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good bicycle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bicycle for my brother (6', 200#). He's very happy with it, but he did mention it feels a little "squirrely" to him and he can't ride it hands-free like he did with his previous bike. He says the bike fits him well. Only minor assembly was required. The only issue we're having is with getting a rack and baskets for the back. It looks like the only rack you can use on this bike is only rated to hold 20# and my brother doesn't drive so he needs to be able to carry everything he can on his bike.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Vogee

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this bike
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this bike!!!! I haven't ridden it about 25 years since I started driving!! The gear shifter is the main reason I bought this because I do not like the new motorcycle style twist gear shifter!! This bike has AWESOME smooth finger shifters!! The bike is not as light as a Trek or Cannondale etc etc but it is also not $2000 plus dollars! I DO HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS BIKE!!!! The rims and tires are amazing too!!
customer_reviews.author: Earth_14

customer_reviews.title: Sweet mountain bike with great features for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Sweet mountain bike with great features for a great price. This bike had all that I wanted in a mountain bike and it’s looks awesome. The ride is extremely smooth and the Shimano touring trigger shifters shift through the gears flawlessly. I love this bike. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good performance right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, good performance. Only complaint I have is seat is terribly uncomfortable for my 77. yr old fanny! Would like other seat options
customer_reviews.author: Joel R. Shattles Jr.

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars for the frame
customer_reviews.text: The frame quality is good and the geometry is comfortable, I bought to make a project bike with the frame. Components like the front/rear mechs and breaks are good enough for the price point. (Will be upgraded anyway) Front/Rear suspension is total garbage but knew that going into it. Has mounts for rear disc and wheels are pretty nice quality. Has a great old school 26er look. Shipping/packaging gets an A+. not a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. It's a great ride. I added a lift to the handlebars and puncture proof tires and off I go into the wide open southwest deserts, over rocks, dirt and sand for mile after mile of fitness and fun. It shifts great the ride is smooth and coast is fast. I'd buy it again if something happened to it. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! Full suspension frame at half the cost of other bikes!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! This bike is everything I needed, plus it was about 50% the cost of other competing products! It has dual suspension, front disk brakes, 24 speeds and a great frame. I weigh about 160 lbs, and have had no problems with the suspension or anything. I ride pretty hard on this thing, and the worst that has happened is the chain will skip a notch or two on the sprocket, if I put too much torque on the cranks. Other than that, this bike is excellent and very smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Ekimsnilloc

customer_reviews.title: Should spend a little more and get a better bike
customer_reviews.text: It was poorly packed and damaged shipping. I was also disappointed in the quality of the bike
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Bike is outstanding for the price! Easy to put together. I am somewhat mechanical and found the assembly very easy and I was able to tune the gears by following the instruction in the 1/4 inch thick instruction book that came with the bike. Now the gears and breaks work perfectly. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: outdoors1016

customer_reviews.title: OMG - Super easy
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to get up and running. Mine had instructions that were spot on. Even included the instruction to fine tune the shifters (which was easy). Put the handlebars on, slide the front wheel on, and pop in the seat. WOW... Now the bike is a little smaller than I had hoped, but it will work well for it's intended purpose. Seems to be great quality and I did notice that the chain is the same brand that is on my $2000 Giant full suspension bike (maybe my Giant has a cheap chain). You really can't go wrong unless you are 6 ft. or more... then probably too small for serious riding.
customer_reviews.author: Stay at Home Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike, good quality. I just wanted a mountain bike I can beat around for good price but still last. This was perfect fit. Also, the lack of disc brakes in rear is fine. Most stopping power is in the front, a true biker would be used to using that one a little more than the rear. That's why most cars have disc front drum back.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: For the money you get a great bike. This is the second Protocol 1.0 bike I buy. The first was back in 2009-2010 and I resold it six years later with no issues. I swapped out the stem and handlebar to fix my size needs. The rear triangle is disc brake ready for future upgrades. The first on the bike I got was not a suntour branded one. The tires where not Kenda but a Schwinn copy. Either way, the bike rides fast and nimble. It is on the heavy side but what can you expect for a sub $500 bike.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: nice bicycle for under $300
customer_reviews.text: This bike is surprisingly nice for the money. It is a little heavy (i assume the weight of the full suspension and swing arm) but the aluminum frame and alloy rims are really stout...the shifting is smooth and flawless once you make your own adjustments. Unfortunatly one cable came misrun from the factory in china. I had to take some things apart to re- route It. I purchased this bike for general riding, my wife and i ride together mostly on the street and it works very well, however if your a serious mountain biker you might want to opt for something more high end. Overall i feel it is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: michael v.

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like being disappointed right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived with scratch in paint on left side and left pedal will not install because the threads are not matched correctly and insert (female) side is soft and bolt on pedal side (male) is steel and any attempt will wind up cross threading. I've owned and worked on many, many bikes over my years, this is an issue that should have been caught prior to shipping. I am guessing I will have to order a new crank assembly for it. Nothing like being disappointed right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rikki Smith

customer_reviews.title: Incorrectly assembled brakes and gears!!
customer_reviews.text: I would have returned it but it was too difficult to....They sent it with the gears and brakes connected incorrectly....Thanks Amazon where was the QC!!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris folan

customer_reviews.title: Nice ride
customer_reviews.text: All parts were there, none missing. Nothing bent or broken. Good looking bike and fun to ride. At 61 yrs of age i did put a more comfortable seat on.
customer_reviews.author: B. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: The frame is great. Everything else is junk
customer_reviews.text: The frame is great. Everything else is junk. Had a pedal rip the screw threading out of the crank arm... TWICE. 1 star for the bike, but another for schwins awesome customer service. Buy a schwin bike, just not this one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: quick shipment. I brought the bike to get repaired as the kickstand broke 2 days after assembling. The bike repair man said that this is a GREAT bike that can't be found anymore. It is an older model and uses older parts (especially the gears) which are much better than the ones used on the newer bikes. He also said that this is the top of the line bike in the lower end choices.
customer_reviews.author: RaphiL

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking bike works well I did have the rear ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bike works well I did have the rear rim bend on my pretty easily but contacted Schwinn and the sent me a new one with no problems great costumer service oh and the bike is on the heavy side if you looking for a light bike this is not it
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: good bike for my 13 year old
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this bike. He mostly uses it for riding in the streets. It was moderately easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: so far, nothing but problems
customer_reviews.text: we have had to order a new crank arm already and now it looks like the crank arm assembly was not put together properly before it was shipped, and we are going to have to fix that too. typical pre assembled product. apparently by a low wage employee with no accountability
customer_reviews.author: Todd Embry

customer_reviews.title: If you are looking for a high functioning bike at a great price this is the ticket
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bike and got it the next day without express shipping. It takes some careful assembly but the gears and breaks work smoothly. If you are looking for a real high end bike, look elsewhere. If you are looking for a high functioning bike at a great price this is the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: n/a
customer_reviews.text: No real issue with the bike, however the cables were not properly secured. I had to readjust both shifter cables and couldn't quite get them perfectly calibrated. Had to take the bike in to a shop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Feels comfortable when riding. Recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Buy Local
customer_reviews.text: Bike came missing any kind of hardware to install the seat. Even worse the front rotor is bent beyond repair. Not worth returning it for, but leaving me with the headache of procuring hardware and a new rotor which you shouldn’t have to do when spending hundreds on a new bicycle. Looks like I won’t be riding today
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Dugan

customer_reviews.title: wrong parts shipped for assembly
customer_reviews.text: bike and parts were received by my son but the wrong pedals were included so they dont fit on the pegs . its really hard to find a phone number to talk to someone at amazon the resolve the problem. its like they think everything will always work out perfectly. and if it doesnt, well, thats your problem. please email me to discuss.
customer_reviews.author: roger thorn

customer_reviews.title: SCHWINN IS A WINN!
customer_reviews.text: After I read a few reviews here I bought it. Was gonna pay for assembly, then read it was super simple. Sure enough it was easy with the right tools. Get the tools you need. Then simple. Finished it. Need a few adjustment. Then to the dirt. Right now just pavement. Good bike so far! Disk brakes full suspension. Plenty of gears. Great!
customer_reviews.author: antonio solis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The seat was missing a screw but overall I’m very happy with this bike.
customer_reviews.author: George Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Best Bike I ever had.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! I ride it five days a week. Best Bike I ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Reta

customer_reviews.title: Flat tire
customer_reviews.text: One of the tires are flat. I wish it wasn’t.
customer_reviews.author: ilovegooddeals

customer_reviews.title: Went on a  camping trip in Yosemite and rode all day with friends.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool bike design. I assembles and tuned everything in less than 30 minutes. I also bought a more comfortable seat and the bestir phone bike mount. Went on a camping trip in Yosemite and rode all day with friends. Very good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Manu

customer_reviews.title: Good bike but Shifting isn’t working properly
customer_reviews.text: In lower gears 2 & 1 the chain rubs against the shifting mechanism by the tire and keeps breaking loose from the gear and won’t grab the gears till I’m at Gears 3 or higher. Other then that it’s a good beginners bike. It’s just not working properly so I can’t give it better then a 3 star
customer_reviews.author: tahnee k.

customer_reviews.title: adjusting the rear brakes was tedious and required I disconnect the line and re-position cuz ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery of the bike. No damage during shipment. Assembly wasn't too difficult. However, adjusting the rear brakes was tedious and required I disconnect the line and re-position cuz it had been assembled improperly. After several hours of tinkering adjusting I got it figured out. Rides fne so far.
customer_reviews.author: PardiJ

customer_reviews.title: very nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike with enough bells and whistles to entertain but does not come with the overpriced sales tag. It's a very nice bike for the recreational rider and it's fun on the trail. I have had no issues with it yet and it performs nicely.
customer_reviews.author: veritech_13Top Contributor: Boxing

customer_reviews.title: this is a great bike
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good bike, rides great, its 95% built. I love this bike, it can hold up to 200 pounds and I would recommend this to a friend. I have one dislike, the pedals that screw into the crank set don't go all the way through and one side of the crank set striped the threads, if this happens to you call the warranty department and they will send you the parts, but first register your bike on the internet. over all, this bike is awesome I put 4 stars just because of what happened to the pedals.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Back brake BROKEN in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the brake broke... My office is 5-min ride from home. Flat and smooth road. I ride like two round per day. Even so, the brake can't handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC or workmanship?
customer_reviews.text: While assembling the bike I found that the front forks were bent and I was not able to attach the wheel. Poor QC or poor workmanship, don't know. I can't comment on the overall bike because I can't assemble it. Waited weeks for the bike for family time and now I'm reboxing and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Alba

customer_reviews.title: A nice ride
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this. It is light, responsive, shifts easily, and has great shock absorption. There is assembly required of course, however, my husband had no problems putting it together. It took him about and hour or so...would have taken less time if he had all the parts, but that has nothing to do with the bike. I feel like this bike will give him years of enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Great bike with a great warranty.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike and great customer service. I stripped out a part of the crank shaft and had to call to order a new piece. To my surprise they shipped the new part out for free. What more can you ask for
customer_reviews.author: christopher

customer_reviews.title: Two rides in and the pedal broke. I hadn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Two rides in and the pedal broke. I hadn't even tried a challenging trail. This was just riding the bike around the neighborhood. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great weekend bike for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Light, good maneuvers, excellent disc brakes, gear seems kind of sturdy at the beginning .
customer_reviews.author: A. Nasso

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: You don’t get what you pay for on this bike. It is a nice bike for riding in town and stuff like that. But it is not a mountain bike! The chain slips all the time and the suspension bottoms out anytime you try to jump or wheelie. This bike is also way overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Perlee

customer_reviews.title: good bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: seems like a great bike for the price. my son, who is just getting serious about mountain biking, loves it. installation was somewhat easy and not that time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb value
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. We have 3 Treks in the house and this is everybit as good a bike. My son loves it and the older one is jealous he only has a front suspension.
customer_reviews.author: 996driver

customer_reviews.title: What really happened to me is something very delicate, one could have even lost his life!
customer_reviews.text: It didn't last a week and the thread went away.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Person that does quality check is blind or cross eyed
customer_reviews.text: Front fork was so bent couldn’t put front wheel on cheap plastic pedals pay all that money for very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, Shimano good but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Breaks and suspension are really good. Shimano doesn't work well all time. Sometimes when you switch gear to lower it switches more than one gear
customer_reviews.author: "okyrylen"

customer_reviews.title: I got upset and gave it a bad review. Was missing a part
customer_reviews.text: Ok after receiving bike, I got upset and gave it a bad review. Was missing a part! Called bike company and they were on it, part is being shipped out. The bike is great, I love it! I always loved Schwinn, my other bike was a Schwinn and u cant go wrong. For people giving a bad review, I don't understand why. Customer service is outstanding so just call them and have defective part replaced.
customer_reviews.author: gman

customer_reviews.title: A bike I can be happy with.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together.Good sturdy bike.Great gear range.Brakes are firm and responsive even in the rain. I replaced the seat because if you love your butt at all u will. (Schwinn gel top)The color scheme makes this an eye catcher. 2 quick notes: 1) buy a good lock, so a walk by doesn't become a ride off. 2)When u lock it and leave, take the quick-release seat clamp with u when u take the seat or you'll comeback to no seat clamp .(Yes it happened 3 days after I got the bike.) Save gas and enjoy the ride.
customer_reviews.author: 300beatz

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike just getting into the sport
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike just getting into the sport. Looks good also with the paint. Rides good however did buy a softer seat cover that makes the ride even better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark T.

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn Protocol 1.0 Men's Mountain Bike
customer_reviews.text: Overall not a bad bike. Needed one to ride with the family and it is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Greggory J Blackmon

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST BIKE I'VE EVER BOUGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike thinking that buying a schwinn would be a good investment, and holy cow was I wrong. 1. The breaks on the back do not work 2. The kick stand is the wrong size so it had to be replaced 3. The bearings had to be replaced twice due to stripping 4. The seat popped off the metal so it would not be put back on which I had to replace If you want a bike that works without having to basically replace all the parts, buy something else. My disdain for this bike is immeasurable, I regret this purchase everyday I have to look at it.
customer_reviews.author: BlueberryMuffin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he was very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Got a great deal on this bike this Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on this bike this Christmas, and our grandson loves it! Good quality, somewhat difficult to put together, but well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: JManring

customer_reviews.title: this bike has been both comfortable as well as easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far, this bike has been both comfortable as well as easy to use. The only issue we had was needing to take it to adjust the gears, because would not shift well , kept slipping and would not grab next gear.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding bike overall! Arrives mostly assembled minus about 20 mins it took for me to complete. Looks amazing and I've been complemented quite a bit. So far I've logged just shy of 100 miles and the only minor complaint I can say is the saddle, but I've ordered one that should take care of that. Shifts well, brakes are great and the suspension really makes the ride comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Good bike for the money it took me 30 minutes to assemble it and then I took it for a test and brakes work good the full suspension is great. I can't wait to go on a nice long rides with it. It's good going up hills.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Prince

customer_reviews.title: Would never buy a Schwinn again
customer_reviews.text: Tire came in with a cut in it. Had to buy a new tube before I ever got to ride it. once I got the new tube installed went out for the ride the entire wheel mechanism broke on my first ride. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is not easy but it's a small challenge
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is not easy but it's a small challenge. Why no manual is offered with bike? I have to download it from website. Very sturdy bike. No room for water bottle drives me crazy. Despite of above disadvantages, everything is good.
customer_reviews.author: XI XIE

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike For The Price
customer_reviews.text: A great bike for the price. Solid build and has handled street and trail biking well. Extremely hard seat and handlebars; expect to replace them for comfort. Partially assembled upon delivery, but requires tools to complete so you may need to take it to a shop if you're not mechanically inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Rogue Photography

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase and easy assembly! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike. Easy to assemble. With minimal tools, took about 20 minutes. Handlebars, pedals, seat and front wheel. Brakes installed, so really easy. Nice ride and I am not having any issues. Really bright (which I like). I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Poppi

customer_reviews.title: This bike is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the bike, I put it together, which took some time, wasnt that complicated to assemble. I ride it everyday now. I love how the gears shift, the brakes are very responsive. its a very good bike for urban or off road path rides. shifting is great, dont have to twist nothing, its trigger finger shifting so makes it easier and cooler. I like how modern it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Wontae Borden

customer_reviews.title: If your looking for a bike under 500$ this is it.
customer_reviews.text: great bike. Can't beat the price, for how much bike you get. Might help if you research how to put together a mountain bike but most importantly how to adjust and size to your body type and personal preference
customer_reviews.author: Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Nice wheels
customer_reviews.text: Like this bike a good looking bike bought this bike to turn it electric ⚡️ like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this sharp looking bike
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bike that my 11 year old son loves. He is 5'7" and with the seat at the lowest position it fits him great. Husband put it together with no problems. Shifts well with a comfortable ride.
customer_reviews.author: D. Langston

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bike at a fantastic price!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing but good things to say about this bicycle and Amazon has always been the way to go, never an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Morris

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: bought this bike to exercise my 49 year old bones and let my German Shorthaired Pointer puppy run off some of her excess energy. only have ridden it once cause this central PA winter just won't quit. if it's not the snow it's the mud from it melting. on it's maiden voyage I was impressed with smooth shifting, strong brakes and solid ride. it's been like 20 years since I peddled a bike so maybe I'm just impressed with the technology advancement. anyhow, I may be naïve but I'm happy with my purchase so far. only flaw I've found is that the front tire has a slow leak.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible bike
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike not just because of the price but the reviews as well. How disappointed I am now. Purchased in 7/2014, the left crank arm became stripped and the bike was no longer in a position to ride around October. I submitted a support email and they finally responded in early January. Miscommunication occurred and support sent the axle instead of the crank arm. After finally getting the crank arm, I installed it in early March once the temperature became nicer. After only 6-7 miles the new crank arm stripped, again. Needless to say, I will not be buying another Schwinn bicycle.
customer_reviews.author: Drahmin

customer_reviews.title: Love this Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Grew up on Schwinn as a top quality product. This is not your Wal-Mart version of a Scwinn, this is the quality most of us who grew up on the brand remember.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike
customer_reviews.text: By far the best and most comfortable bike I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Boggs

customer_reviews.title: my son loves this bike
customer_reviews.text: my 11 year old son loves this bike. its very light weight but sturdy and looks awesome too. he loves the color and the front disc brakes
customer_reviews.author: Mary Maresco

customer_reviews.title: Their customer service was and is great!
customer_reviews.text: break pads came out after only 1 month. wrote to Scwinn and they sent a new caliper, pads and disc for it. Their customer service was and is great!
customer_reviews.author: Hoopah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike I've had it over three years now and it's still in Tip-Top condition. My only problem is finding a place to put my water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Smithie.

customer_reviews.title: Fine bike for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike earlier this year, needing to get winter exercise. It was a good choice. I took it to the local bike shop when I finished assembling it and had them give it a thorough tuning for just $35. It's been good ever since! Recommended for casual riding.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrold R. Plaaten

customer_reviews.title: Bike is heavy as hell and the rear shock has ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike is heavy as hell and the rear shock has a lot of sag even when tightened all the way. Front forks are also clunky too. Aside from that decent enough bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Marceau

customer_reviews.title: Packing was in good shape. Have had for over a year and ...
customer_reviews.text: This bike arrived almost fully assembled. Packing was in good shape. Have had for over a year and it works great. Definitely ready for mountain trails and tough hills with all 24 speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: The bike arrived in perfect condition and the small amount of assembly required was very, very, easy! I am mechanically inclined and the few minor adjustments needed to the brakes only took a few minutes. The seat was a little too hard for my fanny, so I bought a seat with some gel padding. The gear shifting mechanism works quickly and flawlessly and no adjustment was necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Johnie H. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Is not 100% aluminum
customer_reviews.text: This bike it doesn't 100% aluminum the tail is steel and the fork working very bad so a recomend this bike for riding lights.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus A.

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn protocol 1.0
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike so far I've had it for about a month now. it hasn't failed me at all and it's quiet. I love the shocks and they absorb hits really well and it climbs hills very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kid

customer_reviews.title: The price was great and most of the components seem to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: The price was great and most of the components seem to be of good quality. The shocks are not strong enough, though, and the front shock has dust (?) caps that do not stay in place...from day one.
customer_reviews.author: Down Any Road

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for a great price. I take it out all the time. Cool looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Phompanya

customer_reviews.title: Best to compare your needs to your desires on this ...
customer_reviews.text: Best to compare your needs to your desires on this one. If you want a decent bike for a reasonable price you'll love it! If your going to compare it to your buddies more expensive model, well buy your buddies model! If your really into mountain biking, well you wouldn't be looking at this model anyway!
customer_reviews.author: ben cookn

customer_reviews.title: The front derailleur jammed sometimes.
customer_reviews.text: Low quality made. The front derailleur jammed sometimes. Have to stop and fix it off the road. This morning the chain on it was jammed and the bike stopped suddenly, throwing me away on the road. My knee and wrist are still in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Feng Qu

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ridden off road just on the city streets. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A sweet ride
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our 16 year old grandson. It arrived well packed and required some assembly. This was not an issue for my husband as he has a well equipped tool selection but he enjoyed putting it together in little time. I hadread the reviews and this bike was more then we expected. He was pleased by the features and how it rode. It was a beautiful bike and provided a ride experience beyond what he expected based on his comments all favorable I would recommend this. He especially loved the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for short term riders not recommended for serous riders or professional ones because its durability is bad and the chains are easily to get rusted.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good deal for this bike! My husband (5'10, 170lbs) is in love with this mountain bike! He is so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: E. C. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful beginners bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike to do some endurance training while training my quads and it hasn't disappointed me yet. Pros Quick set up Strong frame Good looking bike Con's Shouldn't ride it off road much if you are more than 250 lbs
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Willius

customer_reviews.title: Other than that is a very good bike it feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike, only rason i dont give it a 5 star is because the tires are not Kenda as shown. Other than that is a very good bike it feels very sturdy. great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: great entry level ride
customer_reviews.text: great entry level bike some part you may want to change if your inclined to but otherwise great bike easy to assembly
customer_reviews.author: Stever

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike
customer_reviews.text: Got it today. Great price from amazon. Well packed and delivered on time by fedex. It was easy to assemble, easier than i had thought. Went for a quick ride, so far seems to be good. EDIT: after 3 weeks the bike had a problem. Gear stopped working one day. Thankfully amazon was graceful to take it back and refund. Overall it is a good bike with decent shock abs, breaks and handling. Could be small for a person taller than 5.5''. Definately not a bike for someone seriously looking to put some miles into. Could be used for recreational purpose or going around the neighborhood. Not beyond that.
customer_reviews.author: Lazy Bum

customer_reviews.title: Schwinn Protocol
customer_reviews.text: What a great bike. I highly recommend this bike for all interested mountain bikers. Really easy to assemble, good looking and smooth riding.
customer_reviews.author: Kraz

product_meta.title: Schwinn Protocol 1.0 Men's Mountain Bike, 26" Wheels
product_meta.description:
Style:Protocol 1.0| Color:RedIt has an aluminum dual suspension frame, which means it is lightweight, and will absorb the bumps and ruts that you encounter on the trail. In a similar way the front fork absorbs all the thumps up front, so your arms and shoulders don't have to. There are 24 speeds with Shimano EZ-Fire shifters and a Shimano Altus rear derailleur. The speeds will help you climb the steepest hills and the toughest ravines and the brand names mean the engineering was done right, so there should be nothing but smooth shifting. The Promax front disc brake and rear alloy linear pull brake will give you confidence stopping in dusty and dirty trail conditions. The three piece cranks and double walled alloy rims are light but strong and means that you have a quality bike that was built for mountain biker that wants to get on the mountain and look like they know what they are doing. The Protocol is a solid ride that will give you confidence to get out there and try something new. Owning this bike means you can list mountain biking as one of your hobbies because no-lie, you look like you know what you are doing.

AMAZON.COM
With 26-inch wheels and full suspension, this men's mountain bike is well equipped for adventurous rides. The bike sports a New Down Hill aluminum dual-suspension frame with a forgiving steel rear triangle. The Arrow black anodized alloy rims are designed for tough terrain. Shimano EF-50 trigger shifters deliver 24 speeds, while the Promax front disc and rear alloy linear pull breaks enable you to stop the bike dependably. 

Manufacturer's Warranty
Warranty coverage on the bicycle frame extends for the life of the bicycle while owned by the original retail purchaser. Warranty coverage on Schwinn proprietary bicycle components (excluding tires, tubes, and cables) extends for one year while owned by the original retail purchaser. Warranty coverage of non-proprietary components will be covered by the warranty stated by their original manufacturers. This warranty does not cover normal wear and tear; any damage, failure, or loss caused by accident, misuse, neglect, abuse, theft, or failure to follow instructions or warnings in the owner's manual. 

About Dorel Industries
Dorel Industries is a world-class juvenile products and bicycle company. Established in 1962, Dorel creates style and excitement in equal measure to safety, quality, and value. The company's lifestyle leadership position is pronounced in both its Juvenile and Bicycle categories with an array of trendsetting products. Dorel's powerfully branded products include Cannondale, Schwinn, GT, Mongoose, and SUGOI. Dorel is a $2.2 billion company with 4,700 employees, facilities in 18 countries, and sales worldwide.
feature_bullets: Schwinn aluminum full suspension frame with front suspension fork for reliable, responsive riding
24-speed Shimano EZ-Fire trigger shifters and the Shimano rear derailleur provide a wide gear range and smooth shifting out on the trail
Front disc brake and rear alloy V-brake combine for crisp all-condition stopping
Light and strong alloy rims support knobby mountain tires for durable everyday riding
Schwinn alloy crank offers optimal gearing and less pesky maintenance on your end

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars369 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
